text: ve kahate hai, "jahannam kee aag hamen nahin chhoo sakatee, haan, kuchh gine-chune dinon kee baat aur hai." kaho, "kya tumane allaah se koee vachan le rakha hai? phir to allaah kadaapi apane vachan ke viruddh nahin ja sakata? ya tum allaah ke zimme daalakar aisee baat kahate ho jisaka tumhen gyaan nahin
